snippet.title: Yarn Guardians - Gameplay Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam! Link in comments below ⬇️

Yarn Guardians is a 2D Action-Adventure in which you play as cute flying cats that fight enemies with powerful Yarn Balls! 
Help Rudy and his friends to restore the balance in a fragmented world. Play the story campaign alone or with a friend. Challenge up to three friends in the versus mode.
